ygData.subject: basic installation question - cygwin and cantera

Hi,

I want to use Cantera only from a C++ interface (only need static 
lib=
raries) and need to build from source as I want to be able to modify 
the s=
ource code.

 handle 
the deployment file SetupCantera. Only the Pro version can. I have=
 no

on=
ly using cygwin in windows? 

Adam.
